tasks.task: Flame weeding for crop bed preparation
subtasks: Identifying young weeds for treatment
Applying flame over weeds to cause cell rupture
Using stale seed bed technique with flame weeder
Pre-seeding flame weeding to control emerged weeds
Protecting emerging crops while eliminating surface weeds
Demonstrating flame weeding technique
Describing cell damage from flame heat
Educating on stale seed bed approach
Highlighting crop protection during weeding

tasks.task: Observing weed response to flame weeding
subtasks: Checking wilted weeds after treatment
Noting cell wall rupture and plant death
Monitoring weeds over time for effectiveness
